alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Columbus; Inland Brunswick (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 8:55PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Brunswick and east central Columbus Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 855 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Makatoka, or 11 miles north of Shallotte, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shallotte, Holden Beach, Boiling Spring Lakes, Lake Waccamaw, Bishop, Makatoka, Civie Town, Honey Island, Supply, Exum, Brunswick County Community College Main Campus, Batarora, Mill Creek, Town Creek, Freeman, Winnabow, Bolton, Varnamtown, Bolivia and Brunswick Novant Medical Center. This includes US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 12 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
